      • withPassivationShutdownHook

        public ApplicationBuilder withPassivationShutdownHook()
        Register a JVM shutdown hook that passivate the Application. The hook is registered after activating the Application and before afterActivation().
        Returns:
        This builder

                           throws AssemblyException,

        Returns:

        Throws:
        AssemblyException - if the assembly failed
        ActivationException - if the activation failed

      • configureWithJson

        protected void configureWithJson(JSONObject root)
                          throws JSONException,
                                 AssemblyException
        Configures the application struucture from a JSON document.
        Parameters:
        root - The JSON document root.
        Throws:
        JSONException - if the JSON document isn't valid.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws JSONException,
                        ActivationException,
                        AssemblyException
        main method that read JSON from STDIN.

        Passivation exceptions are written to STDERR if any.

        Parameters:
        args - Unused
        Throws:
        JSONException - if unable to read JSON
        AssemblyException - if the assembly failed
        ActivationException - if the activation failed
